content.rendered: Isabella Ramsay is a partner of Mannheimer Swartling, Chair of the Mergers and Acquisitions practice group in Stockholm and a member of the firm’s Private Equity practice group. She has extensive experience in structuring, negotiating and executing complex national and international transactions. Her practice covers a broad range of private M&A matters, including acquisitions and divestments, spin-offs, joint ventures, strategic partnerships and restructurings. With a particularly strong track record of complex cross-border carve-outs, Isabella has advised on some of the most high-profile deals in this area. Isabella’s client base includes both long-standing corporate clients and recurring private equity firms and she is a prominent member of the firm’s Private Equity group. Isabella is ranked as a leading adviser for M&A and Private Equity by a number of international ranking institutes, including Chambers Global, Chambers Europe and IFLR1000 and “is praised as a very skilled and experienced M&A practitioner”, ”lauded for her ’robust knowledge’ and described by clients as a ’good listener who always tries to understand her client’s needs in order to find a workable solution’”.
